Oak_Lawn.Racine Avenue station:
Racine Avenue is a commuter rail station along the Blue Island Branch of the Metra Electric line in the West Pullman neighborhood of Chicago, Illinois. The station is officially located at Racine Avenue, South of 120th Street, and is 17.04 miles (27.42 km) away from the northern terminus at Millennium Station. In Metra's zone-based fare system, Racine Avenue is in zone D.
Racine Avenue is the last station along the Blue Island Branch within the Chicago city limits.
